overview: Shaukat and Sharif are business partners. Sharif murders Shaukat with Danny's help to take over the business. But a couple and their child saw this scene of murder. They also killed the couple to remove the traces of the murder, but the child escaped. Alam took the child home after seeing him sleeping in the middle of the road. He doesn't know his family history. Meanwhile, the police department starts investigating the murder.
title: Khotipuron
